H0.text: Planting trees will most likely harm a habitat.

H1.text: Water pollution is the factor that will most likely harm a habitat.

H2.text: Rainfall is the factor most likely to harm a habitat.

H3.text: Sunlight is the factor most likely to harm a habitat.

A4.text: Water pollution is a major global environmental problem because it can result in the degradation of all aquatic ecosystems â€“ fresh, coastal, and ocean waters.

A5.text: Water pollution may affect either surface water or groundwater. This form of pollution can lead to many problems.
